overview: Anthony Banas serves as the Chief Technology Officer of Canopy Financial Inc. Mr. Banas joined Canopy Financial in 2004. Mr. Banas served in executive positions for several leading technology companies, including Fair Isaac Corporation (NYSE: FIC), the world’s foremost provider of advanced analytic and enterprise decision management technologies and ADP (NYSE: ADP), a global innovator in transaction processing and information services. He Co-founded and led as Chief Technology Officer of Ilios Partners. Prior to his work with Ilios Partners, Mr. Banas served as the Chief Technology Officer for The Customer Group, a niche, CRM-centric management consultancy. He has contributed to several use patents for scoring technologies and has pioneered new search and selection algorithms for healthcare credit issuance and account management. He serves as a Director of Canopy Financial, Inc. Mr. Banas graduated from Loyola University, where he earned a BS in Computer Science.
